Source code for source.main

"""
This module contains the main program.

"""
from time import time

#from cfg.mdl_syrm_7kW import ModelData
#from model.sm_drive import SynchronousMotorDrive as Model
#from cfg.ctrl_vector_syrm_7kW import pars, base
#from control.sm.vector import Ctrl

from cfg.mdl_im_2kW import ModelData
from model.im_drive import InductionMotorDrive as Model
from cfg.ctrl_vector_im_2kW import pars, base
from control.im.vector import VectorCtrl as Ctrl


from helpers import ref_ramp
from simulation import Simulation

# import cfg


# %% Main program
if __name__ == '__main__':

    # Start computing the execution time

[docs]    start_time = time()


    # Create the model
    mdl_data = ModelData()
    mdl = Model(mdl_data)

    # Create the controller
    ctrl = Ctrl(pars)

    # Define the speed reference and the external load torque
    #ref_ramp(mdl, w_max=base.w, tau_max=20.1, t_max=4)
    ref_ramp(mdl, w_max=base.w, tau_max=14.6, t_max=4)

    # Define the speed reference and load torque
    sim = Simulation(mdl, ctrl, base)

    # Simulate
    sim.simulate()
    sim.plot_figure()
    # sim.save_mat()

    # Print the execution time
    print('\nExecution time: {:.2f} s'.format((time() - start_time)))
